languages.text: {n}Танакия отвечает вам долгим пронзительным взглядом, а потом печально произносит:{/n} "Ну давай по-честному. Почему-то ты мне симпатич{mf|ен|на}... Ксавьер задумал обессмертиться в истории очень экстравагантным образом. Все во благо Империума, естественно. Но потом все пошло не так, как мы ожидали — хотя мы и ожидали, что все так и будет. И теперь тебе лучше удирать отсюда, потому что любой из исходов тебе, скорее всего, не понравится".

{n}Tanakia gives you a long, piercing look, then speaks, sadness audible in her voice:{/n} "Straight, huh? Let's give it a try. I've taken a shine to you for some reason... One day, Xavier decided to immortalise himself in history in a rather extravagant way. All for the Imperium's sake, of course. But then things didn't go as expected, even though we expected that they wouldn't. And now you'd better get far away from here, because whatever happens next, I doubt you're going to like it."
languages.original_text: {n}Танакия отвечает вам долгим пронзительным взглядом, а потом печально произносит:{/n} "Ну давай по-честному. Почему-то ты мне симпатич{mf|ен|на}... Ксавьер задумал обессмертиться в истории очень экстравагантным образом. Все во благо Империума, естественно. Но потом все пошло не так, как мы ожидали — хотя мы и ожидали, что все так и будет. И теперь тебе лучше удирать отсюда, потому что любой из исходов тебе, скорее всего, не понравится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Tanakia gives you a long, piercing gaze, then speaks, sadness audible in her voice:{/n} "Well, let's be honest. I've taken a shine to you for some reason... Xavier had decided to immortalize himself in history in a rather extravagant way. It's all for the Imperium's sake, of course. But then it all went south — even though we had expected it to play out this way. And now, you'd better get away from here, because you wouldn't like either of those outcomes."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

One day, Xavier decided to immortalise himself in history in a rather extravagant way. All for the Imperium's sake, of course. But then things didn't go as expected, even though we expected that they wouldn't. And now you'd better get far away from here, because whatever happens next, I doubt you're going to like it."

languages.text: {n}Tanakia vous regarde longuement de ses yeux perçants, puis se met à parler d'une voix empreinte de tristesse :{/n} « Franchement, hein ? On peut essayer. Je ne sais pas pourquoi, mais je vous aime bien... Un jour, Xavier a décidé de s'immortaliser dans l'histoire de façon assez extravagante. En agissant pour le salut de l'Imperium, bien entendu. Mais tout est allé de travers, même si on s'attendait à ce que les choses tournent ainsi. Maintenant, vous feriez mieux de ficher le camp d'ici, parce que quoi qu'il arrive, je doute que ça vous plaise. »
languages.original_text: {n}Tanakia gives you a long, piercing look, then speaks, sadness audible in her voice:{/n} "Straight, huh? Let's give it a try. I've taken a shine to you for some reason... One day, Xavier decided to immortalise himself in history in a rather extravagant way. All for the Imperium's sake, of course. But then things didn't go as expected, even though we expected that they wouldn't. And now you'd better get far away from here, because whatever happens next, I doubt you're going to like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tanakia vous regarde longuement de ses yeux perçants, puis se met à parler d'une voix empreinte de tristesse :{/n} « Franchement, hein ? On peut essayer. Je ne sais pas pourquoi, mais je vous aime bien... Un jour, Xavier a décidé de s'immortaliser dans l'histoire de façon assez extravagante. En agissant pour le salut de l'Imperium, bien entendu. Mais tout est allé de travers, même si on s'attendait à ce que les choses tournent ainsi. Maintenant, vous feriez mieux de ficher le camp d'ici, parce que quoi qu'il arrive, je doute que ça vous plaise. »
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}Tanakia te lanza una mirada larga y penetrante para luego hablar con una tristeza patente en su voz:{/n} «Vamos a hablar con honestidad. No sé por qué, pero me ha caído bien... Un día, Xavier decidió pasar a la historia por la puerta grande. Todo por el bien del Imperium, por supuesto. Pero las cosas no salieron como esperábamos, y eso que no lo esperábamos de por sí. En fin, será mejor que se marche de aquí; no creo que le guste lo que vaya a ocurrir a continuación».
languages.original_text: {n}Tanakia gives you a long, piercing look, then speaks, sadness audible in her voice:{/n} "Straight, huh? Let's give it a try. I've taken a shine to you for some reason... One day, Xavier decided to immortalise himself in history in a rather extravagant way. All for the Imperium's sake, of course. But then things didn't go as expected, even though we expected that they wouldn't. And now you'd better get far away from here, because whatever happens next, I doubt you're going to like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tanakia te lanza una mirada larga y penetrante para luego hablar, con una tristeza patente en su voz:{/n} «A ver, seamos sinceros. No sé por qué, pero me ha caído bien... Xavier decidió pasar a la historia por la puerta grande. Todo por el bien del Imperium, por supuesto. Pero luego todo se torció, aunque esperábamos que así fuera. En fin, será mejor que se marche de aquí; no querrá verse en una situación semejante».
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}塔娜基娅久久地看着着你，随后开了口，声音中带着悲伤的意味。{/n}“实话实说，是吗？行吧，我试试吧，毕竟我挺喜欢你这个人的……某天，希维尔打算以某种相当奢侈的方式，让自己在帝国的历史上永垂不朽。当然，这一切都是为了帝国，但后来事情出了岔子，虽然我们早就知道事情肯定会出岔子。至于现在，你最好离得越远越好，因为无论接下来发生什么事情，你恐怕都不会喜欢。”
languages.original_text: {n}Tanakia gives you a long, piercing look, then speaks, sadness audible in her voice:{/n} "Straight, huh? Let's give it a try. I've taken a shine to you for some reason... One day, Xavier decided to immortalise himself in history in a rather extravagant way. All for the Imperium's sake, of course. But then things didn't go as expected, even though we expected that they wouldn't. And now you'd better get far away from here, because whatever happens next, I doubt you're going to like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}塔娜基娅久久地凝视着你，随后开了口，声音中带着悲伤的意味。{/n}“好吧，那我就实话实说吧，毕竟我挺喜欢你这个人的……希维尔打算以某种相当奢侈的方式，让自己在帝国的历史上永垂不朽。当然，这一切都是为了帝国，但到了后来，事情变得越来越糟。不过，我们倒也预想到了这样的结果。至于现在，你最好赶紧离开这里，因为无论发生怎样的结果，恐怕你都不会喜欢。”
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}タナキアは鋭いまなざしをしばらくあなたに向けてから、悲しみを含んだ声で告げた。{/n}「正直だね？なら、言ってみようか。なぜかにあんたを気に入ってしまったしね…ある日、ザビエルは、かなり豪勢な方法で歴史に名を残そうとしたんだ。もちろん、すべては帝国のためさ。だけど事態は予想通りには進まなかった。そういうことは予想していたのだけどね。今となっては、あんたもさっさとここから離れた方がいい。次に起こることは、あんたの望むものではないだろうからね」
languages.original_text: {n}Tanakia gives you a long, piercing look, then speaks, sadness audible in her voice:{/n} "Straight, huh? Let's give it a try. I've taken a shine to you for some reason... One day, Xavier decided to immortalise himself in history in a rather extravagant way. All for the Imperium's sake, of course. But then things didn't go as expected, even though we expected that they wouldn't. And now you'd better get far away from here, because whatever happens next, I doubt you're going to like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}タナキアは鋭いまなざしをしばらくあなたに向けてから、悲しみを含んだ声で告げた。{/n}「正直だね？なら、言ってみようか。なぜかにあんたを気に入ってしまったしね…ある日、ザビエルは、かなり豪勢な方法で歴史に名を残そうとしたんだ。もちろん、すべては帝国のためさ。だけど事態は予想通りには進まなかった。そういうことは予想していたのだけどね。今となっては、あんたもさっさとここから離れた方がいい。次に起こることは、あんたの望むものではないだろうからね」
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}Tanakia wirft dir einen langen und durchdringenden Blick zu, ehe sie mit trauriger Stimme sagt:{/n} "Offen, hm? Versuchen wir's. Ich habe Euch irgendwie ins Herz geschlossen ... Eines Tages beschloss Xavier, sich auf recht extravagante Weise in den Geschichtsbüchern zu verewigen. Zum Wohl des Imperiums, versteht sich. Aber dann liefen die Dinge aus dem Ruder, obwohl wir damit nicht gerechnet hatten. Und jetzt solltet Ihr möglichst weit weg von hier fliegen, denn was als Nächstes passiert, wird Euch vermutlich nicht gefallen."
languages.original_text: {n}Tanakia gives you a long, piercing look, then speaks, sadness audible in her voice:{/n} "Straight, huh? Let's give it a try. I've taken a shine to you for some reason... One day, Xavier decided to immortalise himself in history in a rather extravagant way. All for the Imperium's sake, of course. But then things didn't go as expected, even though we expected that they wouldn't. And now you'd better get far away from here, because whatever happens next, I doubt you're going to like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tanakia blickt dich lang und durchdringend an, dann spricht sie mit trauriger Stimme:{/n} "Nun, sind wir doch mal ehrlich. Ich habe Euch aus irgendeinem Grund ins Herz geschlossen ... Xavier hat entschieden, sich auf recht extravagante Weise in den Geschichtsbüchern zu verewigen. Natürlich alles zum Wohl des Imperiums. Aber dann ist alles schiefgegangen, obwohl Ihr erwartet hatten, dass es so kommt. Und nun solltet Ihr lieber verschwinden, Euch würde nämlich keine der beiden möglichen Optionen gefallen."
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}Tanakia sana uzun ve delici bir bakış atıyor. Acısı ses tonundan hissediliyor.{/n} "Dolandırmayalım mı? Deneyelim bakalım. Sana kanım kaynadı... Bir gün Xavier, adını tarihin sayfalarına gösterişli bir biçimde yazdırmaya karar verdi. İmparatorluk uğruna tabii ki. Bu işin sonunda bir terslik olacağını tahmin etmiştik, öyle de oldu. Bence buralardan uzaklaşsan iyi edersin çünkü yaşanacakların hoşuna gideceğini hiç sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Tanakia gives you a long, piercing look, then speaks, sadness audible in her voice:{/n} "Straight, huh? Let's give it a try. I've taken a shine to you for some reason... One day, Xavier decided to immortalise himself in history in a rather extravagant way. All for the Imperium's sake, of course. But then things didn't go as expected, even though we expected that they wouldn't. And now you'd better get far away from here, because whatever happens next, I doubt you're going to like it."
